about_the_game:
The Lightless World is a PC reverse horror action RPG co-op game set in a cosmic horror universe where players control demonic god protagonists.



Play Solo or with a Friend!









In the Lightless World it is your choice either to play solo or cooperate with a friend to fight the Order of the Dawn.

Features


Reverse Horror: In this game you take the role of the "bad" guys, playing as one of the archdemons.

Diverse Character Progression: As you delve deeper into the game, you'll collect powerful items, discover new abilities, and encounter a variety of unique characters. Customize your hero's build and playstyle, adapting to the challenges of each run.

Challenging Enemies and Bosses: Face off against a wide array of menacing foes, from swarms of lesser humans to formidable angelic bosses. Strategic combat and effective use of your character's abilities are essential for success.

Random Events and Challenges: Throughout the map, players encounter random events, challenges, and hidden secrets. These can range from temporal anomalies altering gameplay mechanics to mysterious portals offering valuable rewards or increased difficulty.

Artistic Visuals and Dynamic Soundtrack: Immerse yourself in a visually stunning, ever-shifting environment filled with atmospheric lighting and intricate details. The dynamic soundtrack adapts to the intensity of the gameplay, heightening the sense of tension and excitement.

Character Progression: As players delve deeper into the game, they collect resources, discover powerful artifacts and unlock new abilities!

Skill Tree: In The Lightless World, players embark on a journey of power by navigating a intricate talent tree. This branching system, offers players the opportunity to customize and specialize their character's abilities, shaping their unique playstyle.

As players gain experience points and level up, they earn skill points that can be invested in the talent tree. Unlocking a specific talent often requires points to be allocated in prerequisite skills in that path, promoting a sense of progression and specialization. The choices players make in the talent tree directly influences their character strengths, weaknesses and playstyle.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 8GB / AMD RX 480 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum Requirements may cause frame drops.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700X / Intel Core i7-7600K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660 Super 6GB / Amd RX 590 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended, The game has a variety of visual effects that may cause seizures please stop playing if such symptoms occur.
